articles.title: Mystery owner of 3-million-year-old foot found in Africa identified, scientists say - CBS News
articles.description: The discovery could cast some doubt on the status of Lucy's species as the direct ancestor of Homo sapiens.
articles.content: Newly discovered fossils prove that a mysterious foot found in Ethiopia belongs to a little-known, recently named ancient human relative who lived alongside the species of the famous Lucy, scientists… [+5162 chars]
